Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-21441 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-21441 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-urllib3 is earlier than 2.0.7-4, affected by CVE-2026-21441
